channel.title: A weird error thing
channel.description:
this happens sometimes [code]Connection from h212.235.23.98.static.ip.windstream.net:61864 Connection reset java.net.SocketException: Connection reset at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(Unknown Source) at client.fillInStream(client.java:8949) at client.run(client.java:17304) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (h212.235.23.98.static.ip.windstream.net )[/code]
my questions... wat causes this, how do i fix this? ALL HELP APRECIATED
